title: The paradice of pleasure, or, An encomium upon Darby-ale in answer to a scurrilous lampoon call'd Scott's paradice, or, A satyr against Darby-ale.
author: Ward, Edward, 1667-1731.
notes: Attributed to Ward by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: pages stained and torn, with print showthrough and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
